lb:
Reduces [Main Battery] CD by 5 seconds.
Leadership upgraded to Level 2.

During [Main Battery Salvo], adds a chance to activate [Cut-in].
Royal Responsibility upgraded to Level 2.

Unlocks Overshoot buff, for every [Main Battery Salvo] fired, increases the next shot's damage by 6%. Stacks up to 5 times, lasts till end of the battle.
Leadership upgraded to Level 3.

During Day Battle, increases [Main Battery Salvo] damage by 10%.
Royal Responsibility upgraded to Level 3.

[Main Battery Salvo] now has a 50% chance to penetrate the citadel of an enemy, increasing damage done by 20%.
If the penetrated target sinks, target will explode, dealing 12% damage to all other enemy ships.
Leadership upgraded to Level 4.

traits.name: Leadership
traits.text: Increase Workshop and Bar production by 2%/3%/4%/5%

skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text: Can attack from long range, reload time: 20s

skills.name: Veteran Sniper/br>歴戦の射手
skills.text: 1. If a [Main Battery Salvo] including Warspite sinks an enemy, reduces reload of next salvo by 6 seconds.2. If Queen Elizabeth is in the same fleet, this skill is buffed by 1 extra second.

skills.name:
All Out Attack
渾身の一撃
skills.text:
1. During [Main Battery Salvo], increases chance of [Cut-in] by 20%.
2. The lower the enemy's HP, the more damage Warspite deals, up to 30%.

skills.name:
Royal Eminence
王家の威厳
skills.text: 1.Every time the fleet fires a [Main Batter Salvo], increases Warspite's [Main Battery Salvo]'s Critical Rate by 10%.Can stack up to 5 times per battle.2.When entering a battle, obtains a shield that can absorb damage equal to 20% of Warspite's Max HP

comment: Cold and without compassion, Warspite operates completely on logic. Stubborn and uncompromising, her words are also very blunt, and she ends up hurting the feelings of others without realizing it...
